data.text:
A day off――I spotted Symboli Kris S and 
she seemed to be deep in thought.
data.processed:
<story>A day off――I spotted Symboli Kris S and 
<story>she seemed to be deep in thought.

data.text:
――Trainer. 
……I wanted to do some sightseeing.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>――Trainer. 
<story>……I wanted to do some sightseeing.

data.text:
――I want to know more about Japan. 
As part of―― my mission.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>――I want to know more about Japan. 
<story>As part of―― my mission.

data.text:
Her mission――to liven up the racing world in Japan. 
Is she trying to learn more about Japan?

choices.text: Want to see some famous places?

data.processed:
<story>Her mission――to liven up the racing world in Japan. 
<story>Is she trying to learn more about Japan?

data.text: No―― I've already seen them…… in Tokyo, at least.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>No―― I've already seen them…… in Tokyo, at least.

data.text:
So―― now……I want to―― see more modern places in Japan. 
But…… I don't know where I should go……
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>So―― now……I want to―― see more modern places in Japan. 
<story>But…… I don't know where I should go……

data.text:
So she probably means places that aren't historical tourist 
attactions, but places that really feel like Japan. In that case――
data.processed:
<story>So she probably means places that aren't historical tourist 
<story>attactions, but places that really feel like Japan. In that case――

data.text:
And so…… we ended up at an amusement park. And if we were talking 
about the most Japan-like attractions there――
data.processed:
<story>And so…… we ended up at an amusement park. And if we were talking 
<story>about the most Japan-like attractions there――

data.text: ――Understood.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――Understood.

data.text: (Woooo～～…… rumble rumble rumble……)
data.processed: <story>(Woooo～～…… rumble rumble rumble……)

data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――――

data.text:
Even though it was my own suggestion, it was quite scary…… 
But, Symboli Kris S seemed completely unfazed.
data.processed:
<story>Even though it was my own suggestion, it was quite scary…… 
<story>But, Symboli Kris S seemed completely unfazed.

data.text: ――…………How envious～……!
data.name: Ghost
data.processed: <story>――…………How envious～……!

data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――……

data.text:
It didn't look like she was scared but…… 
what was it that she seemed so interested in……?
data.processed:
<story>It didn't look like she was scared but…… 
<story>what was it that she seemed so interested in……?

data.text: ……Quaint――
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>……Quaint――

data.text: …………U-ummm……
data.name: Ghost
data.processed: <story>…………U-ummm……

data.text:
Since the person pretending to be a ghost seemed to be getting 
uncomfortable, we moved on! And so, next we headed to――
data.processed:
<story>Since the person pretending to be a ghost seemed to be getting 
<story>uncomfortable, we moved on! And so, next we headed to――

data.text: ――――Japan's Jet Coaster…………
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――――Japan's Jet Coaster…………

data.text: And off we go, in 3, 2, 1――
data.name: Attendant
data.processed: <story>And off we go, in 3, 2, 1――

data.text: (Woooooosh――!!)
data.processed: <story>(Woooooosh――!!)

data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――――！

data.text:
After getting off the Jet Coaster, 
Symboli Kris S stopped in front of the rails.
data.processed:
<story>After getting off the Jet Coaster, 
<story>Symboli Kris S stopped in front of the rails.

data.text: ――……That's……
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――……That's……

data.text:
――Solid construction…… those seats, 
and rails. Exceptional――saftey.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>――Solid construction…… those seats, 
<story>and rails. Exceptional――saftey.

data.text:
It seemed like she was really interested. 
……I could almost imagine her eyes sparkling.
data.processed:
<story>It seemed like she was really interested. 
<story>……I could almost imagine her eyes sparkling.

data.text:
After taking her through the attactions, 
it was time to hit the souvenir shops.
data.processed:
<story>After taking her through the attactions, 
<story>it was time to hit the souvenir shops.

data.text:
I wondered if there were any items that just about 
screamed Japan. And when we were looking around the shop――
data.processed:
<story>I wondered if there were any items that just about 
<story>screamed Japan. And when we were looking around the shop――

data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>…………

data.text: She was staring at a certain shelf.
data.processed: <story>She was staring at a certain shelf.

data.text:
On the shelf, a tag read 『Clearance Sale』. To put it bluntly, it 
seemed filled with miscellaneous unwanted items.
data.processed:
<story>On the shelf, a tag read 『Clearance Sale』. To put it bluntly, it 
<story>seemed filled with miscellaneous unwanted items.

data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――……

data.text: ――――……Seems like they're not being bought.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――――……Seems like they're not being bought.

data.text:
She muttered under her breath as she looked over the item in her 
hand. Looked like……it was just a hamburger-shaped knickknack.
data.processed:
<story>She muttered under her breath as she looked over the item in her 
<story>hand. Looked like……it was just a hamburger-shaped knickknack.

data.text:
Is she looking at it so seriously because 
she doesn't understand what it's for?
data.processed:
<story>Is she looking at it so seriously because 
<story>she doesn't understand what it's for?

data.text:
――I don't know. 
But…… there has to be something. ――Some purpose……
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>――I don't know. 
<story>But…… there has to be something. ――Some purpose……

data.text:
……? 
――The lettuce…… can be removed……?
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>……? 
<story>――The lettuce…… can be removed……?

data.text:
The lettuce had several different sized circular holes in it. 
There was probably a ruler as well.
data.processed:
<story>The lettuce had several different sized circular holes in it. 
<story>There was probably a ruler as well.

data.text:
――Seems like it. 
The cheese―― maybe it's a drafter's ruler……?
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>――Seems like it. 
<story>The cheese―― maybe it's a drafter's ruler……?

data.name: Symboli Kris S

choices.text: Looks like we found its purpose
Looks like we found its purpose

data.processed: <story>…………

data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――――！

data.text:
……That's good. ――…… I think…… 
…………that too.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>……That's good. ――…… I think…… 
<story>…………that too.

data.text:
Well―― 
…………――I'll buy it.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>Well―― 
<story>…………――I'll buy it.

data.text:
Symboli Kris S' eyes wavered as she mumbled quietly. 
Is she confused―― or is she embarrassed?
data.processed:
<story>Symboli Kris S' eyes wavered as she mumbled quietly. 
<story>Is she confused―― or is she embarrassed?

data.text:
As I watched her at the register, 
somehow it seemed like she was satisfied.
data.processed:
<story>As I watched her at the register, 
<story>somehow it seemed like she was satisfied.

data.text:
After leisurely enjoying the amusement park, 
the sun had set by the time we got back to school.
data.processed:
<story>After leisurely enjoying the amusement park, 
<story>the sun had set by the time we got back to school.

data.text: ――Today was helpful.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――Today was helpful.

data.text: I got a taste of Japan…… and―― bought something good.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>I got a taste of Japan…… and―― bought something good.

data.text: ――――Is that……so.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed: <story>――――Is that……so.

data.text:
As taciturn as usual. 
But…… it seemed like she was happy.
data.processed:
<story>As taciturn as usual. 
<story>But…… it seemed like she was happy.
